https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/gnoFSrEV0RGCVUjgcNacLRla5qk.jpg "Beer for My Horses" tells the story of two best friends that work together as deputies in a small town. The two defy the Sheriff and head off on an outrageous road trip to save the protagonist's girlfriend from drug lord kidnappers. Beer for My Horses
